class.name: Lua
class.description: It is recommended to always use [code]ProtectedCall=true[/code], otherwise the engine will crash if a error happens. [code]CallbackCaller[/code] and [code]Callback[/code] can be defined to handle the error message instead printing them to the console.

method.name: call_function
method.description: Calls a function inside current Lua state. This can be either a exposed function or a function defined with with [code]do_file()[/code] or [code]do_string()[/code]. You may want to check if the function actually exists with [code]lua_function_exists(LuaFunctionName)[/code]. This function supports 1 return value from lua. It will be returned as a variant and if lua returns no value it will be null.

method.name: do_file
method.description: Loads a files content as a string and calls [code]do_string[/code] with it.

method.name: do_string
method.description: Executes [code]Code[/code] as a piece of Lua code.

method.name: expose_function
method.description: Defines a lua function with name [code]LuaFunctionName[/code]. When Lua code calls it, it will call the [code]GDFunction[/code] method of [code]NodeObject[/code], so make sure the object still exists at this moment.

method.name: kill_all
method.description: Kills all current lua threads in execution.

method.name: lua_function_exists
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] only if [code]LuaFunctionName[/code] is defined in current Lua's state as a function.

method.name: push_variant
method.description: Will push a copy of a Variant to lua.

method.name: set_threaded
method.description: Set weather Lua runs on a seperate thread. Default is false
